definition: tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
fragrant/sweet smelling/aromatic/savory or appetizing/(to eat) with relish/(of sleep) sound/perfume or spice/joss or incense stick/CL:根[gen1]
root of Vladimiria souliei (used in TCM)/Dolomiaea souliei

sentences.english: On circumscription of the genus Dolomiaea DC.
sentences.chinese: 关于川木香属的界限问题。

sentences.english: Methods The TLC method was used to distinguish the Radix Notoginseng and the Radix Aucklandiae in this prescription.
sentences.chinese: 方法采用TLC对本处方中的三七和木香进行鉴别。

sentences.english: Generally, the genetic diversity of Aquilaria sinensis (Loureiro) Sprengel is high.
sentences.chinese: 总体而言，白木香具有较高的遗传变异水平。

sentences.english: Objective To establish the fingerprints for the volatile oil of Aucklandia lappa Decne.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立木香饮片挥发油指纹图谱。

sentences.english: Who is the master of Jizulotus mountain?
sentences.chinese: 鸡足山木香坪的主人是谁？

sentences.english: Ziyin Bushen Pill can markedly decrease the content of descresept A in slender Dutchmanspipe root.
sentences.chinese: 滋阴补肾丸可显著降低青木香中马兜铃酸A的含量。

sentences.english: Methods Radix Aucklandiae and Cortex Cinnamomi were identified by TLC.
sentences.chinese: 方法采用薄层色谱法对处方中木香和肉桂进行鉴别。
